CAREER SUMMARY

I am an active, creative person who likes to learn and discover new things. I organize my time to make the most of it, I have many hobbies and I try new ones often I enjoy doing my work, I like to be aware on the latest advances of the sector and I want to direct my career towards the frontend design, for being a more creative part.I am cheerful and positive, with ease to integrate people and wanting to learn everything.

  • Parallel software engineer intern

    Appentra
    2015 Oct - 2016 Feb
    When I started this internship, Appentra was a start up who worked on making code parallelization easier by building software that automates the insertion of openMP directives. Among the tasks I did are: the study of mathematical algorithms for their parallelization, improvement of some Python scripts for the generation of C code, and data treatment using Google Apps Script.

    Achievements

    • Analysis of different parallelization approaches for the Cholesky decomposition algorithm.
    • Learning Python and making minor changes to the company product.
    • Using Google Apps Script for importing JSON data into Google Sheets and generate charts.
    • Use of Scrum methodology for software development.

    Technologies used
